biotools.summary: ccPDB (Compilation and Creation of datasets from PDB) is designed to provide service to scientific community working in the field of function or structure annoation of proteins. This database of datasets is complied from the literature and the Protein Data Bank (PDB), where all datasets were derived from PDB.
